title: [Site Update] Visual updates, even more formatting buttons and more!
body:
Hey Summoners!

We have been rolling out a number of new features over the last week. These include:

* Updated visual design for the discussion page
* Custom design for the [esports community](http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/esports)
* A facelift for the toolbar and new buttons for unordered lists and blockquotes *(This list was made with the toolbar!)*

We also added the toolbar to the comments on articles at [leagueoflegends.com](http://www.leagueoflegends.com/), so now you can post your best champion icon puns under every article! And that's not all from us, we have some more big stuff coming down the pipe that you should be seeing pretty soon!

As always, we love hearing what you think, and we take your feedback very seriously. Let us know!

replies.body:
If I may make a suggestion:

In addition to icons for Champions, Summoner Spells, and Items, how about adding Champion Ability icons?
I would defiantly have to agree with cryypet, could you guys make champion, and champion ability, i know it would take some work to get them all done but please think about it :) {{champion:35}}

{{champion:17}} likes it!  
Oh! {{champion:36}} just got here.

I love it! Although a bit of nit-picking, the e-sports picture at the top right I personally feel should be *below* the search bar and 'create discussion' button. As well as anytime the word e-sports comes up its 'esports' not 'e-sports'. Completely nit-picking and all imho. Love the direction and love that background too!
So is there going to be a specific visual look for EVERY subcommunity or just eSports? Because I'd love for lore discussion or something similar to have the old parchment style.
that esports page is looking pretty sweet. looking forward to other improvements/add-ons
Wow the esports community looks awesome! I'd really love for us to be able to underline text on the Community Beta. It would help me out a bit when making posts in the Help & Support sub.
